description: This file defines the NoteDao class responsible for CRUD operations on notes within a SQLite database, utilizing Android's database APIs.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: A data access object providing CRUD operations for notes stored in a SQLite database, encapsulating database interactions.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes from the database, ordered by the last update time descending.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a specific note by its ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Adds a new note to the database and returns the generated ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database, identified by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database by ID.

methods.name: mapCursor
methods.description: Converts a database cursor into a list of Note objects.

methods.name: mapRow
methods.description: Maps a database cursor row to a Note object.
